001package edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.controller;
002
003import android.content.Context;
004import android.content.Intent;
005import android.content.res.Resources;
006import android.os.Bundle;
007import android.view.LayoutInflater;
008import android.view.Menu;
009import android.view.MenuInflater;
010import android.view.MenuItem;
011import android.view.View;
012import android.view.ViewGroup;
013import android.widget.Spinner;
014import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
015import androidx.annotation.Nullable;
016import androidx.core.view.MenuProvider;
017import androidx.fragment.app.Fragment;
018import androidx.lifecycle.Lifecycle.State;
019import androidx.lifecycle.LifecycleOwner;
020import androidx.lifecycle.ViewModelProvider;
021import androidx.navigation.NavController;
022import androidx.navigation.Navigation;
023import dagger.hilt.android.AndroidEntryPoint;
024import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.R;
025import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.GuessesAdapter;
026import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.adapter.SwatchesAdapter;
027import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.databinding.FragmentGameBinding;
028import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Game;
029import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.model.Guess;
030import edu.cnm.deepdive.codebreaker.viewmodel.CodebreakerViewModel;
031import java.util.List;
032import java.util.Map;
033import java.util.function.Function;
034import java.util.stream.Collectors;
035import java.util.stream.IntStream;
036import java.util.stream.Stream;
037
038@AndroidEntryPoint
039public class GameFragment extends Fragment implements MenuProvider {
040
041  private FragmentGameBinding binding;
042  private CodebreakerViewModel viewModel;
043  private GuessesAdapter adapter;
044  private Map<Integer, String > colorNameLookup;
045  private Map<Integer, Integer> colorValueLookup;
046  private Map<Integer, Integer> colorPositionLookup;
047  private int codeLength;
048
049  @Override
050  public void onCreate(Bundle savedInstanceState) {
051    super.onCreate(savedInstanceState);
052    setupColors();
053  }
054
055  private void setupColors() {
056    Resources res = requireContext().getResources();
057    int[] colorValues = res.getIntArray(R.array.color_values);
058    String[] colorNames = res.getStringArray(R.array.color_names);
059    colorNameLookup = Stream.of(colorNames)
060        .collect(Collectors.toMap((name) -> name.codePointAt(0), Function.identity() ));
061    colorValueLookup = IntStream.range(0, colorNames.length)
062        .boxed()
063        .collect(Collectors.toMap((pos) -> colorNames[pos].codePointAt(0), (pos) -> colorValues[pos]));
064    colorPositionLookup = IntStream.range(0, colorNames.length)
065        .boxed()
066        .collect(Collectors.toMap((pos)->colorNames[pos].codePointAt(0), (pos)->pos));
067  }
068
069  @Override
070  public View onCreateView(
071     @NonNull LayoutInflater inflater, ViewGroup container, Bundle savedInstanceState) {
072    // load and bind layout
073    binding = FragmentGameBinding.inflate(inflater, container, false);
074    binding.submit.setOnClickListener((v)-> submitGuess());
075    // TODO: 2/7/2024 Initialize any view widgets as necessary
076    return binding.getRoot();
077  }
078
079  @Override
080  public void onViewCreated(@NonNull View view, @Nullable Bundle savedInstanceState) {
081    super.onViewCreated(view, savedInstanceState);
082    requireActivity().addMenuProvider(this, getViewLifecycleOwner(), State.RESUMED);
083    //  Connect to viewmodels
084    setupViewModels();
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public void onCreateMenu(@NonNull Menu menu, @NonNull MenuInflater menuInflater) {
089    menuInflater.inflate(R.menu.game_options,menu);
090  }
091
092  @Override
093  public boolean onMenuItemSelected(@NonNull MenuItem menuItem) {
094    boolean handled = true;
095    int itemId = menuItem.getItemId();
096    if (itemId ==R.id.new_game){
097      adapter = null;
098      viewModel.startGame();
099      // Commented code is for original navigation
100//    } else if (itemId == R.id.settings) {
101//      NavController controller = Navigation.findNavController(binding.getRoot());
102//      controller.navigate(GameFragmentDirections.navigateToSettings());
103    } else {
104      handled = false;
105    }
106    return handled;
107  }
108
109  private void setupViewModels() {
110    connectToViewModel();
111    LifecycleOwner owner = getViewLifecycleOwner();
112    observeGame(owner);
113    observeInProgress(owner);
114  }
115
116  private void connectToViewModel() {
117    viewModel = new ViewModelProvider(requireActivity()).get(CodebreakerViewModel.class);
118    getLifecycle().addObserver(viewModel);
119  }
120
121  private void observeGame(LifecycleOwner owner) {
122    viewModel
123        .getGame()
124        .observe(owner, this::handleGame);
125  }
126
127  private void handleGame(Game game) {
128    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
129    if (adapter == null) {
130      adapter = new GuessesAdapter(requireContext(), guesses, colorNameLookup, colorValueLookup);
131      binding.guesses.setAdapter(adapter);
132      createSpinners(game);
133    }
134    adapter.notifyDataSetChanged();
135    binding.guesses.post(()->binding.guesses.smoothScrollToPosition(guesses.size()-1));
136    codeLength = game.getLength();
137  }
138
139  private void observeInProgress(LifecycleOwner owner) {
140    viewModel
141        .getInProgress()
142        .observe(owner, (inProgress)->{
143          int visibility = inProgress
144              ? View.VISIBLE
145              : View.INVISIBLE;
146          binding.colorSelectors.setVisibility(visibility);
147          binding.submit.setVisibility(visibility);
148        });
149  }
150
151  private void createSpinners(Game game) {
152    int codeLength = game.getLength();
153    List<Guess> guesses = game.getGuesses();
154    int[] selectedItem = guesses.isEmpty()
155        ? new int[codeLength]
156        : guesses
157            .get(guesses.size()-1)
158            .getContent()
159            .codePoints()
160            .map(colorPositionLookup::get)
161            .toArray();
162    Context context = requireContext();
163    binding.colorSelectors.removeAllViews();
164    LayoutInflater layoutInflater = getLayoutInflater();
165    for (int i = 0; i < codeLength; i++) {
166      Spinner spinner = (Spinner)
167          layoutInflater.inflate(R.layout.color_spinner, binding.colorSelectors, false);
168      spinner.setAdapter(new SwatchesAdapter(context));
169      spinner.setSelection(selectedItem[i]);
170      binding.colorSelectors.addView(spinner);
171    }
172  }
173
174  private void submitGuess() {
175    String guess = IntStream.range(0,binding.colorSelectors.getChildCount())
176        .mapToObj((pos)-> (Spinner) binding.colorSelectors.getChildAt(pos))
177        .map((spinner) -> (String) spinner.getSelectedItem())
178        .map((colorName)-> colorName.substring(0,1))
179        .collect(Collectors.joining());
180    viewModel.submitGuess(guess);
181  }
182
183  @Override
184  public void onDestroyView() {
185    binding = null;
186    adapter = null;
187    super.onDestroyView();
188  }
189}
